#	ID	名称	商店类型	商品	刷新类型	手动刷新	<end>
#	int	string	int	int[]	int	int	<end>
#	idx	name	type	commodity	refrishType	refrishHand	<end>
#	1202000001	商店	1	1203010001|1203010002|1203010004|1203010005|1203010006|1203010007|1203010008|1203010009|1203010010	0	0	<end>
#	1202000002	随机	3	1001|1001|1001|1001|1001|1001	0	1	<end>
#	1202000003	充值	2	1205010001|1205010002|1205010003|1205010004|1205010005|1205010006	0	0	<end>
#	1202000004	积分	1	1203040001|1203040002|1203040003|1203040004|1203040005|1203040006|1203040007|1203040008	0	0	<end>
